passive.name: Contentment
passive.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. After the wearer uses Ultimate to attack enemy targets, inflicts the targets with the "Woefree" state, lasting for {{5}} turn(s). While in "Woefree," enemy targets take <orangeStrong>{{2, percent}}%</orangeStrong> increased DMG. The effect of increasing DMG taken is additionally boosted by <orangeStrong>{{4, percent}}%</orangeStrong> if the wearer's current Break Effect is {{3, percent}}% or higher.
